name: Icon
description: Icon component for SVG icons. Provides accessible SVG icon display with configurable sizes and symbols from the CivicTheme icon library.

assets_dir.description: Directory path containing icon asset files.

when_to_use: Enhance buttons and links with visual indicators
Indicate file types or external links
Provide visual cues for actions (search, close, download)
when_not_to_use: As the sole means of conveying important information - always provide text alternatives
For decorative purposes only - consider if the icon adds meaningful value
When a text label would be clearer than an icon
For complex concepts that don't have universally understood icons
best_practices: Use consistent icon sizing throughout the interface
Choose icons with clear, recognizable meanings
Provide appropriate alt text or ARIA labels when icons convey meaning
Use icons consistently for the same actions across the application
Ensure icons have sufficient color contrast
Test icon recognition with users when possible
Consider cultural differences in icon interpretation

accessibility.notes: Component provides proper SVG markup with accessibility attributes. Ensure meaningful icons have appropriate ARIA labels or text alternatives.

variations: Size options: Small, medium, large, extra-large variants
Symbol library: Extensive collection of common interface icons
Asset management: Configurable asset directory for icon files
Styling: Inherits color from parent elements or explicit styling
Context usage: Navigation, buttons, links, status indicators

findings: Users recognize common icons more quickly than text labels
Consistent icon usage improves interface learnability
Icons with text labels have the highest comprehension rates
Size and contrast significantly impact icon usability
